home__description: He is a Masters student in Computer Science at New York University, specializing in machine learning, data engineering, and software development.
about__description: I am a NYU CS master with experience in machine learning and software engineering. I have developed deepfake detection platforms, RAG-based chatbots, and real-time analytics systems. Proficient in Python, Java, C++, AWS, and Kubernetes, I have optimized AI models and backend infrastructures. I also published research on federated learning in IEEE Transactions on Big Data. Passionate about AI and scalable systems, I enjoy building high-performance applications.

skills__list5: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Oracle, MilvusDB, Elasticsearch
skills__list6: Git, Docker, AWS, Azure, CMake, Jenkins, Nginx, CI/CD, Postman, LangChain, FFmpeg, OpenCV, Grafana, Prometheus

portfolio2__description: Designed hybrid retrieval framework with LangChain and MilvusDB, enhancing query performance and improving search relevance by 21.7%.
